title: Apple’s Car Project Loses Three More Key Engineers
itunes:title: Apple’s Car Project Loses Three More Key Engineers
description:
Dr. Kawsar Talaat, Associate Professor at the Johns Hopkins Bloomberg School of Public Health, discusses vaccinating children for Covid. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg News Health Care Reporter Robert Langreth talk about the Businessweek Magazine cover story One Vaccine to Beat All Coronaviruses Isn’t So Far-Fetched. Bloomberg News West Coast Correspondent Ed Ludlow explains how Apple's self-driving car project has lost three key engineers in recent weeks. And we Drive to the Close with Hilary Kramer, President and CIO at A&G Capital.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
